text: if you've been to India then the head
wobble or bobble is a form of expression
that you would have likely come across
on a daily basis if you are planning on
heading to India then you will quickly
learn about this head wobble within
hours or even minutes of arriving do you
know where the passenger pickup in you
do is your bug yeah that's my that's my
taxi no no no taxi no taxi no no taxi no
wait that's my bank yep no can see you
see how this looks kind of like a cross
between a nod and a shake does it mean
yes or wait does it mean no the head
wobble has indeed several meanings it is
the non verbal equivalent to the Hindi
word aksha which also has several
meanings such as good or I understand so
what exactly does this wobble that
causes so much confusion and wonderment
amongst foreigners really mean let's
take a look
a fast in continuous head wobble means
that the person really understands the
more vigorous the wobbling the more
understanding there is a quick wobble
from side to side means yes or all right
a slow soft wobble sometimes accompanied
by a smile is a sign of friendship and
respect moving your head down means you
are calling someone
moving your head up is asking what's up
I spent six months living in India and
upon arriving during my first week I was
introduced to the head wobble and let's
just say I had no idea what it meant and
let's just say that caused me to get a
little lost when asking for directions
excuse me I'm trying to get to Howard
wire when I get to the end of the road I
turn right oh yes okay actually into my
book I have left my turn right it's not
left what is left so I turn left but
wait is it right but you just said left
just like various areas in India have
different customs and religions the head
wobble also varies depending where you
are in the country so the further south
you go just like if you are in the state
of Kerala that is a place where the head
wobble is very exaggerated and if you go
all the way north to Dharamsala it's not
even that common to use the head wobble
for those of you heading to India or
thinking about heading to India I must
warn you the head wobble is extremely
infectious it took me two whole days
before I picked it up myself and was
using it all the time in fact I was
skyping with my parents during the first
week of being in India and they were
asking me all these questions about my
travels about India and all I could do
was they thought something was wrong
with my neck but now just do my head
wobble hi mom hi dad hi Kristin how's
India do you want to talk to the dog she
wants to say hi why are you wobbling
your head head wobble what head wobble
for me the head wobble has become an
instinct no matter where I am in the
world if I meet someone who does indeed
head wobble I automatically respond with
the head wobble myself the head wobble
is by far my favorite way of
communicating with someone it's just so
fun and I hope that you enjoyed this
video and I hope that you just reacted
to me saying that with a nice head
wobble nice exaggerated yes I will see
all you lovely adventurers next time
happy travels
wait before you go don't forget to
subscribe so you never miss out on any
upcoming adventures
